summary: Adding a new questline that will allow the player to travel north to the lost continent of Atmora.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center]﻿﻿
[img]https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/480335960253661186/480478024987443220/v1.png[/img]﻿
﻿[/center]
[left][size=3]The shadows of the past reach beyond the Sea of Ghosts. They are hiding dark memories, shrouded in mystery. Do you have the courage to unveil them? Would you risk your life to embark on an adventure into unknown territory? To a place said to be more hostile and desolate than any other? If so, welcome on board, traveler. The expedition awaits.

[b]
Features:
[/b]
[/size][list]
[*][size=3]A new quest line that will bring you to Atmora.[/size]
[*][size=3]Custom NPCs, Armours, Weapons, Landscape, Dungeons, Textures, Items, Effects and Music.[/size]
[*][size=3]Lore-friendly and immersive expansion of the story of the main game.[/size]
[*][size=3]Deep exploration of what is very most likely accurate by all given information and logical conclusions.[/size]
[*][size=3]Gameplay that is partly linear in story-telling and amplifies a unique playstyle like survival for Frostfall users. [/size]
[/list][b]

Requirements:[/b][size=3]
[/size][/left][size=3]
[/size][list]
[*][size=3]Dawnguard[/size]
[*][size=3]Dragonborn[/size]
[*][size=3]Hearthfires[/size]
[/list][left][size=3]

[b]Recommended Mods:[/b]
[b]
[/b][list]
[*][b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3222]IHUD[/url]﻿[/b] by Gopher
[*][b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11163]Frostfall[/url]﻿ & [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64798]Campfire[/url]﻿[/b] by Chesko
[*][b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27563?tab=description]Wet And Cold[/url]﻿[/b] by Isoku
[*][b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51473]Ineed[/url]﻿[/b] by Isoku (or another needs/food mod of your choice)
[*][b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12092]Cloaks of Skyrim[/url]﻿[/b] by Nikinoodles
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13486/?]CoS Winter is Comming[/url]﻿ by Nivea
[*][b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74402]HD Horkers[/url]﻿[/b] by Pfuscher
[/list][b]
Installation:[/b]

[list]
[*]Mod Organizer: Click on download and make sure you checked it as an active plugin when starting the game.
[*]Nexus Mod Manager: like Mod Organizer. Might struggle with big files.
[*]Manual Installation: Download, unpack and place in Skyrim/Data.
[/list]

[b]A Hint When Uninstalling:
[/b]
The game bakes data of used plugins into your saved games. If you wish to stop using [i]Beyond Skyrim: Atmora[/i], you are strongly advised to roll back to a saved game that predates your installation or start a new saved game. Else, it is very likely you see bugs, due to the missing files, which is a common issue with big mods and Skyrim.[/size][/left]
author: Atmora-Calling Team within the Beyond-Skyrim-Community
